name: Heir Obscure - Alpha Demo
description:
Thank you for checking out the Heir Obscure Alpha Demo!

Heir Obscure is best played with headphones.

Heir Obscure is a stealth immersive sim inspired by beloved classics. Stay in the shadows, listen carefully for enemy positions, unlock magical abilities to assist you, and take back what’s rightfully yours. Discover the lies and secrets of those who took everything from you, and restore an old kingdom to its former glory,

Key Features

  • For fans of classic immersive sims and hardcore stealth games
  • Realistic stealth mechanics including using shadows to remain concealed, and using quiet surfaces to remain unheard
  • A dark, detailed setting with a gripping, mysterious narrative
  • Created by a solo developer
